Description:
As you approach the island, you hear a sweet tune. As you get closer, some sailors become mesmerized by it. You realize that you are nearing a group of mermaids.

It is a truth universally acknowledged that they are dangerous to sailors who get lost in their songs, but they are known to be a grateful folk if you can speak with them...
DescriptionAction: Would you risk to meet the mermaids?
